description: In order to put the governance mechanisms to the test and take advantage of these functionalities to finally reduce all these damned windmills to dust despite the efforts of Sancho Panza to dissuade us.
members: Mike Hornan(ABLE), SMAUG(SMAUG), Johnny Kelly, Adam Rusch, Nicolas Lovecoach, Mladen Lm(RUMOR), Martin(ATADA), Rick McCraken(DIGI)
